name: Joker in disguise
description:
Long live the King! Can you become a King?

Joker card disguised himself as Ace and attempts to become a King by killing all ranks in King's army one rank at a time. Use your arrow keys to chase and dodge King's army! See how far up can you go.

This game is my attempt at # 185 Trijam(https://itch.io/jam/trijam-185), my first game making jam. It was suppose to be done in 3 hours, I needed a little more time(around five and a half). Theme was "Kings and Queens".

Credits:

Lil Pie  (https://opengameart.org/content/planks-floor-20)

drawsgood  (https://drawsgood.itch.io/8bit-deck-card-assets)

Sound Effects where created using Chiptone
